name: R5-NameUse-R4-NameUse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NameUse into a FHIR R4 NameUse

element.display: Anonymous assigned name, alias, or pseudonym (used to protect a person's identity for privacy reasons).

target.display: Anonymous assigned name, alias, or pseudonym (used to protect a person's identity for privacy reasons).

element.display: A name used prior to changing name because of marriage. This name use is for use by applications that collect and store names that were used prior to a marriage. Marriage naming customs vary greatly around the world, and are constantly changing. This term is not gender specific. The use of this term does not imply any particular history for a person's name.

target.display: A name used prior to changing name because of marriage. This name use is for use by applications that collect and store names that were used prior to a marriage. Marriage naming customs vary greatly around the world, and are constantly changing. This term is not gender specific. The use of this term does not imply any particular history for a person's name.

element.display: A name that is used to address the person in an informal manner, but is not part of their formal or usual name.

target.display: A name that is used to address the person in an informal manner, but is not part of their formal or usual name.

element.display: The formal name as registered in an official (government) registry, but which name might not be commonly used. May be called "legal name".

target.display: The formal name as registered in an official (government) registry, but which name might not be commonly used. May be called "legal name".

element.display: This name is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).

target.display: This name is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).

element.display: A temporary name. Name.period can provide more detailed information. This may also be used for temporary names assigned at birth or in emergency situations.

target.display: A temporary name. Name.period can provide more detailed information. This may also be used for temporary names assigned at birth or in emergency situations.

element.display: Known as/conventional/the one you normally use.

target.display: Known as/conventional/the one you normally use.
